entry.headline: Visa lancia il primo servizio per l`effettuazione di pagamenti mobili per transazioni commerciali nell`America Latina
entry.body: La collaborazione con Telefónica e VisaNet Perú evidenzia la domanda crescente di servizi e pagamenti elettronici nell`America Latina SAN FRANCISCO e BARCELONA, California--(Business Wire)-- Visa Inc. (NYSE: V), società leader del settore dei pagamenti a livello globale, ha annunciato l`istituzione di un programma per pagamenti mobili in collaborazione con VisaNet Perú e Telefónica. Pago Móvil con Visa (Visa Mobile Pay) è un nuovo servizio che permette ai titolari di carte Visa peruviani di pagare prodotti e servizi per mezzo della semplice inizializzazione di un pagamento tramite la rete wireless. Potranno avvalersi di tale servizio tutti i titolari di un conto Visa in possesso di una carta di credito o debito emessa da Banco de Crédito, Interbank, BBVA Continental e Scotiabank in Perù. Il primo programma per pagamenti mobili per transazioni commerciali di Visa in Perù, il cui lancio è stato annunciato quest`oggi durante il secondo vertice annuale dedicato ai pagamenti mobili `GSMA Mobile Money Summit` tenutosi a Barcelona, è il primo programma del genere ad essere lanciato nell`America Latina. Inizialmente, i titolari di un conto Visa potranno usare il proprio cellulare per pagare corse in taxi e consegne a domicilio di bouquet floreali, nonché per coprire il saldo del proprio servizio wireless prepagato. È prevista l`aggiunta di ulteriori segmenti commerciali, quali consegne di prodotti farmaceutici, erogazione del gas e ordinazioni tramite catalogo. "Stiamo per raggiungere una pietra miliare nel settore dei pagamenti nell`America Latina" ha dichiarato Jurgen Wassmann, Direttore della divisione Prodotti e canali emergenti presso Visa Inc., responsabile della regione America Latina e Caraibi. "Visa sta introducendo nell`America Latina il futuro dei pagamenti con una tecnologia che semplifica la vita ai consumatori permettendo loro di effettuare pagamenti in qualsiasi momento, ovunque e in modo semplice e pratico." Il servizio Pago Móvil con Visa è particolarmente attraente per i commercianti ubicati in aree remote e per le imprese mobili sprovviste di accesso a un`infrastruttura per telecomunicazioni cablate. Il servizio permette ai commercianti di accettare pagamenti elettronici tramite la rete wireless, ovviando alla necessità di disponibilità di un terminale di pagamento tradizionale (cablato). VisaNet Perú, l`acquisitore della transazioni di pagamento tramite carte di debito o credito Visa in Perù, sta sovrintendendo all`implementazione del servizio Pago Móvil con Visa. Dal collaudo alla commercializzazione "La domanda da parte dei consumatori di un accesso sicuro ed efficiente ai servizi finanziari mobili sta registrando un aumento in tutto il mondo" ha dichiarato Tim Attinger, Direttore della divisione internazionale Sviluppo prodotti presso Visa Inc., durante il suo intervento tenuto in occasione del vertice Mobile Money a Barcelona. "Stiamo per giungere a un punto di svolta, ove le nostre prime iniziative di collaudo di tecnologie per l`effettuazione di pagamenti mobili in varie parti del mondo hanno iniziato a promuovere il passaggio del commercio mobile dalla fase di collaudo alla piena implementazione commerciale." Il lancio di Pago Móvil con Visa giunge a sole poche settimane di distanza dal lancio del primo servizio al mondo per pagamenti mobili offerto da Visa per transazioni commerciali presso il punto vendita usando la tecnologia per comunicazioni a campo ravvicinato (Near Field Communications, NFC). Il programma è stato annunciato congiuntamente con Maxis, il maggiore operatore wireless della Malesia con oltre 11 milioni di utenti; Nokia, il più importante produttore di cellulari a livello mondiale; e Maybank, un importante istituto finanziario malese. Il lancio di questo servizio contrassegna la prima volta che i consumatori potranno acquistare un dispositivo mobile abilitato alla tecnologia NFC presso un punto vendita wireless che potranno usare per effettuare pagamenti presso il punto vendita anziché dover far scorrere una tradizionale carta di pagamento. Visa sta apportando al settore wireless le proprie competenze in materia di pagamenti e sta collaborando attivamente con operatori di reti wireless, istituti finanziari, produttori di cellulari e fornitori di piattaforme e tecnologie. La strategia perseguita da Visa nel settore mobile consiste nell`ampliare la portata della sua rete globale per l`offerta di servizi finanziari mobili ai consumatori residenti sia in Paesi sviluppati che in Paesi emergenti. La società già fornisce servizi per pagamenti mobili e altri servizi annessi tramite operatori e istituti finanziari suoi partner in cinque continenti. Informazioni di carattere generale su Visa Inc.: Visa Inc. gestisce la più grande rete del mondo per pagamenti elettronici per transazioni al dettaglio e offre servizi per l`elaborazione di pagamenti, nonché piattaforme di pagamento. I servizi, offerti sotto i marchi Visa, Visa Electron, Interlink e PLUS, comprendono pagamenti per transazioni commerciali, servizi prepagati e tramite carte di debito e credito. Visa vanta un`accettazione ineguagliata in tutto il mondo, e Visa/PLUS è una delle reti globali di sportelli automatici più grande del mondo che offre l`accesso a denaro contante in valuta locale in più di 170 Paesi. Per ulteriori informazioni, si prega di visitare il sito Web all`indirizzo www.corporate.visa.com. Il testo originale del presente annuncio, redatto nella lingua di partenza, è la versione ufficiale che fa fede. Le traduzioni sono offerte unicamente per comodità del lettore e devono rinviare al testo in lingua originale, che è l'unico giuridicamente valido. Visa Inc. Elvira Swanson, +1 415 932 2564 globalmedia@visa.com Copyright Business Wire 2009

entry.author: None
entry.headline: ExxonMobil and Electrovaya Launch Car Program in Baltimore
entry.body: Corporation Sponsors Exhibit at Maryland Science Center on Automotive Energy Efficiency * Program features the first fleet of all-electric vehicles featuring lithium ion battery technology with ExxonMobil`s separator films, in a consumer car-sharing and rental program in North America. * Company developed new exhibit for Center, featuring hands-on activities and full-scale car showcasing energy efficiency and new technologies. HOUSTON--(Business Wire)-- Today ExxonMobil took another important step in meeting the world`s growing energy needs by announcing the sponsorship of an all-electric car-sharing and rental program, called AltCar, at the Maryland Science Center in Baltimore, MD. The new electric vehicles at the science center, called the Maya-300, are powered exclusively by enhanced lithium ion battery technology. They are one of the first fleets of all-electric vehicles using this technology in a consumer car-sharing and rental program in North America. ExxonMobil`s battery separator film enables the use of Electrovaya`s Lithium Ion Superpolymer battery in the vehicle. Under the program, Baltimore residents and tourists can rent these vehicles at the science center in the Baltimore Inner Harbor during the day to drive around the city to experience the feel of an electric vehicle. The five-door, five-passenger urban vehicle is equipped with the safety, performance and convenience features common to cars. "This program is a perfect example of the important role innovative companies and organizations, such as ExxonMobil, Electrovaya and the Maryland Science Center, will play in addressing the world`s need for safe, low emission, fuel-efficient vehicles," said Sankar Das Gupta, president and chairman, Electrovaya. Baltimore Mayor Sheila Dixon, and Malcolm Woolf, director of the Maryland Energy Administration, also were in attendance at today`s event, expressing their gratitude and support to Electrovaya and ExxonMobil, for their support of the Maryland Science Center. In addition to the car-sharing program and to help raise awareness among Baltimore residents and science center visitors about the future of energy efficient transportation, ExxonMobil also has developed a state-of-the-art exhibit for the science center that includes hands-on activities for children and a full-scale car that showcases clean transportation technologies currently being used in the automotive industry. ExxonMobil has invested more than half a million dollars in the car-sharing program and exhibit, including the purchase of the vehicles and development of the exhibit. "Through innovations like these showcased in this innovative program and world-class exhibit, ExxonMobil is helping make vehicles more efficient," said Jim Harris, senior vice president, polymers, ExxonMobil Chemical Company. "We believe that advances in technology are the solution to many of the toughest energy challenges. Our scientists and researchers are committed to finding and applying those technologies where we can, including on the car you drive." The battery separator film, which is produced at a plant in Nasu, Japan together with Japanese affiliate TonenGeneral, enables battery manufacturers to significantly increase the power, capacity, mechanical strength and safety margins of today`s lithium ion batteries. In addition to the film, ExxonMobil also is working on a number of additional innovative transportation technologies. These include a new blend of synthetic rubber and nylon that enables tires to retain air pressure longer, as well as new lightweight plastics that enable auto manufacturers to improve a car`s performance while maintaining affordability and reducing fuel consumption. In the past five years, ExxonMobil has invested more than $1.5 billion to increase energy efficiency and reduce greenhouse gases. About ExxonMobil Chemical ExxonMobil Chemical is one of the world`s premier petrochemical companies with manufacturing, technology, and marketing operations around the world. The company delivers a broad portfolio of products and solutions efficiently and responsibly, with a commitment to create outstanding customer and shareholder value. ExxonMobil Chemical endorses the principles of sustainable development, including the need to balance economic growth, social development and environmental considerations. To learn more, visit www.exxonmobilchemical.com. About TonenGeneral TonenGeneral is an ExxonMobil affiliate and the world`s second-largest producer of separator film for lithium-ion batteries. For more information visit: http://www.tonengeneral.co.jp/apps/tonengeneral/english/index.html. About Electrovaya Electrovaya is the developer and manufacturer of the proprietary Lithium Ion SuperPolymer battery technology. Its mission is to accelerate clean transportation as a commercial reality with its advanced power systems for all classes of zero-emission electric vehicles and plug-in hybrid electric vehicles. The Company's shares trade on the Toronto Stock Exhange under the symbol EFL. For more information about Electrovaya visit www.electrovaya.com, and for more information on the Maya 300 visit www.mayaelectric.com. About Maryland Science Center The Maryland Science Center at Baltimore's Inner Harbor is visited by more than 500,000 people each year. The science center`s focus is on remaining a vital community resource and economic development engine now and in the future by showcasing the latest and greatest in science and technology. For more information about the science center visit http://www.marylandsciencecenter.org/. Note to Editors 1. The AltCar program being launched today involves five cars with a further five cars to be made available to the public in the next few weeks. Depending on battery size each car can travel a distance of up to 60 or up to 120 miles. 2. The term "ExxonMobil Chemical" refers collectively to some or all of the companies affiliated with Exxon Mobil Corporation, and/or itself, which have chemical manufacturing and/or marketing operations around the world. entry.author: None
entry.headline: ExxonMobil and Electrovaya Launch Car Program in Baltimore
entry.body: Corporation Sponsors Exhibit at Maryland Science Center on Automotive Energy Efficiency * Program features the first fleet of all-electric vehicles featuring lithium ion battery technology with ExxonMobil`s separator films, in a consumer car-sharing and rental program in North America. * Company developed new exhibit for Center, featuring hands-on activities and full-scale car showcasing energy efficiency and new technologies. HOUSTON--(Business Wire)-- Today ExxonMobil took another important step in meeting the world`s growing energy needs by announcing the sponsorship of an all-electric car-sharing and rental program, called AltCar, at the Maryland Science Center in Baltimore, MD. The new electric vehicles at the science center, called the Maya-300, are powered exclusively by enhanced lithium ion battery technology. They are one of the first fleets of all-electric vehicles using this technology in a consumer car-sharing and rental program in North America. ExxonMobil`s battery separator film enables the use of Electrovaya`s Lithium Ion SuperPolymer battery in the vehicle. Under the program, Baltimore residents and tourists can rent these vehicles at the science center in the Baltimore Inner Harbor during the day to drive around the city to experience the feel of an electric vehicle. The five-door, five-passenger urban vehicle is equipped with the safety, performance and convenience features common to cars. "This program is a perfect example of the important role innovative companies and organizations, such as ExxonMobil, Electrovaya and the Maryland Science Center, will play in addressing the world`s need for safe, low emission, fuel-efficient vehicles," said Sankar Das Gupta, president and chairman, Electrovaya. Baltimore Mayor Sheila Dixon and Malcolm Woolf, director of the Maryland Energy Administration, were in attendance at today`s event, expressing their gratitude and support to Electrovaya and ExxonMobil for their support of the Maryland Science Center. In addition to the car-sharing program and to help raise awareness among Baltimore residents and science center visitors about the future of energy efficient transportation, ExxonMobil also has developed a state-of-the-art exhibit for the science center that includes hands-on activities for children and a full-scale car that showcases clean transportation technologies currently being used in the automotive industry. ExxonMobil has invested more than half a million dollars in the car-sharing program and exhibit, including the purchase of the vehicles and development of the exhibit. "Through innovations like these showcased in this innovative program and world-class exhibit, ExxonMobil is helping make vehicles more efficient," said Jim Harris, senior vice president, polymers, ExxonMobil Chemical Company. "We believe that advances in technology are the solution to many of the toughest energy challenges. Our scientists and researchers are committed to finding and applying those technologies where we can, including on the car you drive." The battery separator film, which is produced at a plant in Nasu, Japan together with Japanese affiliate TonenGeneral, enables battery manufacturers to significantly increase the power, capacity, mechanical strength and safety margins of today`s lithium ion batteries. In addition to the film, ExxonMobil also is working on a number of additional innovative transportation technologies. These include a new blend of synthetic rubber and nylon that enables tires to retain air pressure longer, as well as new lightweight plastics that enable auto manufacturers to improve a car`s performance while maintaining affordability and reducing fuel consumption. In the past five years, ExxonMobil has invested more than $1.5 billion to increase energy efficiency and reduce greenhouse gases. About ExxonMobil Chemical ExxonMobil Chemical is one of the world`s premier petrochemical companies with manufacturing, technology, and marketing operations around the world. The company delivers a broad portfolio of products and solutions efficiently and responsibly, with a commitment to create outstanding customer and shareholder value. ExxonMobil Chemical endorses the principles of sustainable development, including the need to balance economic growth, social development and environmental considerations. To learn more, visit www.exxonmobilchemical.com. About TonenGeneral TonenGeneral is an ExxonMobil affiliate and the world`s second-largest producer of separator film for lithium-ion batteries. For more information visit: http://www.tonengeneral.co.jp/apps/tonengeneral/english/index.html. About Electrovaya Electrovaya is the developer and manufacturer of the proprietary Lithium Ion SuperPolymer battery technology. Its mission is to accelerate clean transportation as a commercial reality with its advanced power systems for all classes of zero-emission electric vehicles and plug-in hybrid electric vehicles. The Company's shares trade on the Toronto Stock Exchange under the symbol EFL. For more information about Electrovaya visit www.electrovaya.com, and for more information on the Maya-300 visit www.mayaelectric.com. About Maryland Science Center The Maryland Science Center at Baltimore's Inner Harbor is visited by more than 500,000 people each year. The science center`s focus is on remaining a vital community resource and economic development engine now and in the future by showcasing the latest and greatest in science and technology. For more information about the science center visit www.marylandsciencecenter.org. Note to Editors The AltCar program being launched today involves five cars with a further five cars to be made available to the public in the next few weeks. Depending on battery size each car can travel a distance of up to 60 or up to 120 miles. entry.author: None
entry.headline: Zoho Integrates Productivity Suite into Microsoft SharePoint
entry.body: Zoho Office for Microsoft SharePoint Lets Users Work with Files Using Zoho Apps, Store Files Back to Microsoft SharePoint BOSTON & PLEASANTON, Calif.--(Business Wire)-- Zoho today announced Zoho Office for Microsoft SharePoint, http://www.zoho.com/sharepoint, which lets users work with Zoho online collaborative productivity applications to create, view, and edit files stored in Microsoft SharePoint. A video tour of Zoho Office for Microsoft SharePoint is available at http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F5VQErRSnd0. Zoho will discuss this announcement further with media, analysts, and end users via an open conference call on 1-866-206-0240, PIN: 128660#, with an online presentation at http://tinyurl.com/zohoshow to be held today at 1:00 p.m. Eastern time (10:00 a.m. Pacific time). "Zoho Office for Microsoft SharePoint brings the collaborative advantages of Zoho productivity applications to Microsoft SharePoint users," said Raju Vegesna, Zoho evangelist. "We noticed that some businesses like the collaboration capabilities of online productivity applications, but they prefer to keep their data behind their firewall. With Zoho Office for Microsoft SharePoint, we are offering the best of both worlds - collaborative productivity apps integrated with Microsoft SharePoint behind the corporate firewall." Online Apps with Offline Data: Perfect Integration for Businesses Zoho Office for Microsoft SharePoint is delivered as an add-on that installs on top of Microsoft SharePoint 2007 and 2003. Once installed, Zoho Office for Microsoft SharePoint lets users working in Microsoft SharePoint view, edit, and create documents, spreadsheets, and presentations in Microsoft Office formats, but using Zoho online applications. When a user clicks on a file in Microsoft SharePoint, the options will include "Edit in Zoho Editor" and "View in Zoho Editor." The Edit option opens the file for editing in a Zoho editor within Microsoft SharePoint - either Zoho Writer, Zoho Sheet, or Zoho Show, depending upon the file selected. The view option opens the file for viewing in appropriate Zoho applications within Microsoft SharePoint. The user must be connected to the Internet to access Zoho applications. "Collaboration is one of the key aspects for online productivity applications, so we don't just call ours `Productivity Applications.` We call them `Collaborative Productivity Applications,`" Vegesna said. "With Zoho Office for Microsoft SharePoint, we bring collaborative editing capabilities to Microsoft SharePoint." Zoho Office for Microsoft SharePoint enables multiple users to work collaboratively on the same document at the same time, seeing each other's changes instantly. That same functionality is available in online Zoho applications. With this add-on, Zoho brings the advantage of online collaborative editing to Microsoft SharePoint users. Vegesna continued, "With Zoho Office for Microsoft SharePoint, users can view and edit files directly in their browsers, inside Microsoft SharePoint with no additional installations required on client computers. This approach lets users work on Microsoft SharePoint documents from any operating system and in this economy, can help save some money on Microsoft Office licenses." Pricing and Availability Zoho Office for Microsoft SharePoint is available today as a 30-day free trial version. After the trial period, users may buy an annual subscription for $24/user. A monthly subscription is also available for $3/user. For more information on Zoho, please visit www.zoho.com. To get breaking Zoho news, please visit and subscribe to the RSS feed at http://blogs.zoho.com/ or follow us on Twitter at @zoho. About Zoho Zoho is a comprehensive suite of award-winning on-line business applications. Customers use Zoho to run their business processes, manage their information and be more productive while at the office or on the go, without having to worry about expensive or outdated hardware or software. To date, Zoho has launched 19 different applications - from CRM to Mail, Reports, and Wikis. Zoho has received numerous awards, including a 2009 Webware 100 Award, a 2008 PC World "25 Most Innovative Products Award" and a 2007 TechCrunch "Best Enterprise Start-up." Zoho is a division of ZOHO Corp., a privately-held and profitable company. With headquarters in Pleasanton, CA and offices in Austin, New Jersey, London, Tokyo and Beijing, ZOHO Corp. serves the technology needs of more than 40,000 customers worldwide. For more information about Zoho, please visit http://www.zoho.com/. All brand names and product names are trademarks or registered trademarks of their respective companies. entry.headline: Extend the Power of Microsoft SharePoint with New Edition of Quest Web Parts for SharePoint
entry.body: Advanced Version Dramatically Simplifies Application Development BOSTON--(Business Wire)-- Quest Software, Inc., (Nasdaq: QSFT) today announced the newest version of Quest Web Parts for SharePoint. This essential productivity solution streamlines and simplifies the application development process by providing the ability to customize and build more robust SharePoint® sites, applications, menus and dashboards through configuration rather than code. "Customizing SharePoint often requires complex coding for seemingly simple tasks," said David Waugh, vice president and general manager of Unified Communications and Collaboration, Quest Software. "Quest Web Parts for SharePoint removes the core challenges of code creation so that both developers and non-developers are more efficient and SharePoint sites are more powerful." With its one-of-a kind integrated ezEdit Configuration Interface, Quest Web Parts for SharePoint radically simplifies SharePoint web part configuration by accelerating tedious tasks and simplifying the sometimes confusing coding process. This high-performance interface reduces the time and cost required to build applications, making Quest the only vendor in the SharePoint space to offer this kind of configuration tool. In addition, the latest version also includes a new DiscussionView web part that improves the ability to easily follow and track discussions, as well as dramatically improved charting functionality. "Quest Web Parts for SharePoint enabled us to use a single suite of tools that allowed for integration, visual customizations and real application development, all within the browser," said Stephen Alderman, IM technology architect, Redland Shire Council. "The program is flexible and allows us to create real enterprise MOSS applications directly in the browser without custom code." Demonstrations of Quest Web Parts for SharePoint are available at The SharePoint Technology Conference in Boston today through June 24, in booth 109. Quest SharePoint expert Mike Watson is a featured speaker at the event (1:30 p.m. EDT, June 22; 1:45 p.m. EDT, June 23; and 8:30 a.m. EDT, June 24). For more information or to register, please visit http://www.sptechcon.com/. Availability and Pricing Quest Web Parts for SharePoint is now available in customizable starter packs and product bundles. Price ranges from $3,495 to $15,000 USD per front-end server. For additional product details, or to download a free 30 day trial, please visit http://www.quest.com/web-parts-for-sharepoint/. About Quest Software, Inc. Quest Software, Inc., a leading enterprise systems management vendor, delivers innovative products that help organizations get more performance and productivity from their applications, databases, Windows® infrastructure and virtual environments. Quest also provides customers with client management through its ScriptLogic subsidiary and server virtualization management through its Vizioncore subsidiary. Through a deep expertise in IT operations and a continued focus on what works best, Quest helps more than 100,000 customers worldwide meet higher expectations for enterprise IT. Quest`s Unified Communications and Collaboration solutions simplify, automate and secure Exchange Server, SharePoint Server, Windows Server, Office® Communications Server and BlackBerry Server. Quest is the Microsoft Global ISV Partner of the year for 2004 and 2007. Quest Software can be found in offices around the globe and at www.quest.com. Quest, Quest Software and the Quest logo are trademarks or registered trademarks of Quest Software in the United States and certain other countries. Microsoft, SharePoint, and Windows are registered trademarks of Microsoft Corporation in the United States and/or other countries. Other trademarks and registered trademarks are property of their respective owners. Web Links Referenced in this Release: Quest Software, Inc. - www.quest.com Web Parts for SharePoint - www.quest.com/web-parts-for-sharepoint/ SharePoint - www.quest.com/sharepoint/ The SharePoint Technology Conference - http://www.sptechcon.com/ Quest Software, Inc. Sara E. O`Malley, 614-726-4768 sara.omalley@quest.com Twitter: @SaraOMalley Copyright Business Wire 2009

entry.headline: Chevron Announces First Oil Production From Frade Field in Brazil
entry.body: Project is the Company`s First Major Upstream Development in Brazil SAN RAMON, Calif.--(Business Wire)-- Chevron Corporation (NYSE:CVX) announced today that its subsidiary Chevron Brasil Upstream Frade Ltda. has commenced crude oil production from the Frade Field, the company`s first operated deepwater development in Brazil. The estimated $3 billion project, with continuing development drilling, is expected to achieve peak production of 90,000 barrels of crude oil and natural gas liquids per day in 2011. "Successful development of the Frade Field unlocks a great new source of energy for the next two decades while establishing a significant platform from which Chevron can grow its upstream business within one of the world`s most promising deepwater oil and gas regions," said George Kirkland, Chevron's executive vice president for Upstream and Gas. Chevron has a 51.74 percent operating interest in the Frade Field, which contains an estimated 200 million to 300 million barrels of recoverable oil. The field is situated in the Campos Basin in approximately 3,700 feet (1,128 m) of water, approximately 230 miles (370 km) northeast of Rio de Janeiro. Frade is a subsea development with wells tied back to a floating production, storage and offloading vessel. Crude oil production is planned to be exported to world markets, and natural gas production is expected to be provided for domestic use in Brazil. Other partners in the project are Petróleo Brasileiro S.A. - Petrobras, 30 percent; and Frade Japão Petróleo Ltda., a joint-vehicle company of INPEX, Sojitz and JOGMEC, 18.26 percent. Ali Moshiri, president of Chevron Africa and Latin America Exploration and Production Co., said, "Today`s milestone is a direct result of the coordinated expertise and commitment demonstrated by our employees, partners and contractors in Brazil and around the world. Frade is an exciting asset that integrates the unique skills of both Chevron and Petrobras to help deliver new jobs, new facilities and new energy production in Brazil for Chevron." Chevron Corporation is one of the world`s leading integrated energy companies, with subsidiaries that conduct business worldwide. The company`s success is driven by the ingenuity and commitment of approximately 62,000 employees who operate across the energy spectrum. Chevron explores for, produces and transports crude oil and natural gas; refines, markets and distributes transportation fuels and other energy products; manufactures and sells petrochemical products; generates power and produces geothermal energy; provides energy efficiency solutions; and develops the energy resources of the future, including biofuels and other renewables. Chevron is based in San Ramon, Calif. More information about Chevron is available at www.chevron.com. Cautionary Statement Relevant to Forward-Looking Information for the Purpose of "Safe Harbor" Provisions of the Private Securities Litigation Reform Act of 1995. Some of the items discussed in this press release are forward-looking statements about Chevron`s activities inBrazil. Words such as "anticipates," "expects," "intends," "plans," "targets," "projects," "believes," "seeks,""estimates," "budgets" and similar expressions are intended to identify such forward-looking statements. Thestatements are based upon management`s current expectations, estimates and projections; are not guarantees offuture performance; and are subject to certain risks, uncertainties and other factors, some of which are beyond thecompany`s control and are difficult to predict. Among the factors that could cause actual results to differ materiallyare changes in prices of, demand for and supply of crude oil and natural gas; actions of competitors; continueddevelopment of the field; the potential disruption or interruption of production and development activities due towar, accidents, political events, civil unrest, or severe weather; government-mandated sales, divestitures,recapitalizations and changes in fiscal terms or restrictions on scope of company operations; and general economicand political conditions. You should not place undue reliance on these forward-looking statements, which speakonly as of the date of this press release. Unless legally required, Chevron undertakes no obligation to updatepublicly any forward-looking statements, whether as a result of new information, future events or otherwise.U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) rules permit oil and gas companies to disclose only provedreserves in their filings with the SEC. Certain terms, such as "resources," "oil in place," "recoverable resources,""oil-equivalent resources," "potentially recoverable volumes" and "recoverable oil," among others, may be usedin this press release or other public disclosures that are not permitted to be used in filings with the SEC. Chevron Corporation Scott Walker, +1-713-372-4923 (Houston) mobile: +1-281-221-5765 swlk@chevron.com Copyright Business Wire 2009

entry.headline: Visa introduceert eerste commerciële mobiele betalingsdienst in Latijns-Amerika
entry.body: Samenwerking met Telefónica en VisaNet Perú onderstreept toenemende vraag naar elektronische betalingen en diensten in Latijns-Amerika SAN FRANCISCO & BARCELONA, Californië (VS)--(Business Wire)-- Visa Inc. (NYSE: V), wereldmarktleider in betalingsdiensten, heeft bekendgemaakt dat het in samenwerking met VisaNet Perú en Telefónica een programma voor mobiel betalingsverkeer gaat starten. Pago Móvil con Visa (Visa Mobile Pay) is een nieuwe dienst waarmee houders van een Visa-kaart in Peru voor producten en diensten kunnen betalen door gewoon via het draadloze netwerk een betalingsopdracht te geven. De dienst is beschikbaar voor rekeninghouders met een Visa creditcard of pinpas die is uitgegeven door de Banco de Crédito, de Interbank, de BBVA Continental of de Scotiabank in Peru. Visa`s eerste commerciële programma voor mobiele betalingsdiensten in Peru, dat vandaag is aangekondigd op het tweede jaarlijkse GSMA-congres over mobiel geldverkeer in Barcelona, is het eerste programma in zijn soort in Latijns-Amerika. In de eerste fase zullen VISA rekeninghouders hun mobiele telefoon alleen kunnen gebruiken voor betaling van taxibedrijven en bloemenbezorgdiensten en voor het opwaarderen van hun prepaid rekening. In een later stadium zullen andere marktsegmenten worden toegevoegd, zoals bezorgdiensten voor farmaceutische producten, gasleveranciers en catalogusbedrijven. "We naderen een mijlpaal in de betalingsbranche in Latijns-Amerika", aldus Jurgen Wassmann, directeur "Emerging Products and Channels" bij Visa Inc. voor de regio Latijns-Amerika en de Cariben. "Visa brengt de toekomst van het betalingsverkeer naar Latijns-Amerika, met een technologie die het leven van consumenten gemakkelijker maakt doordat ze altijd en overal, snel en eenvoudig kunnen betalen." Pago Móvil con Visa is met name aantrekkelijk voor handelaren in afgelegen regio`s en voor mobiele bedrijven die geen toegang hebben tot een infrastructuur voor vaste telecommunicatie. De dienst biedt handelaren de mogelijkheid elektronische betalingen te accepteren via het draadloze netwerk, zodat ze geen traditionele (vaste) betalingsterminal meer nodig hebben. VisaNet Perú, dat de rechten op krediet- en debettransacties in Peru heeft verworven, zal de invoering van Pago Móvil con Visa begeleiden. Van testfase tot commercieel gebruik "De consumentenvraag naar veilige, efficiënte toegang tot mobiele financiële diensten neemt wereldwijd toe", zei Tim Attinger, wereldwijd directeur "Product Development" bij Visa Inc., tijdens de toespraak die hij als hoofdspreker hield op de "Mobile Money Summit", het congres over mobiel betalingsverkeer in Barcelona. "Wij zijn al vroeg begonnen met het wereldwijd opzetten van proefprojecten voor mobiele betalingstechnologie. En nu naderen we het omslagpunt waarop mobiele handel de testfase verlaat en commercieel volledig tot ontplooiing komt." De introductie van Pago Móvil con Visa komt slechts twee weken na de lancering van `s werelds eerste commerciële mobiele betalingsdienst van Visa voor kassatransacties waarbij gebruik wordt gemaakt van NFC-technologie (Near Field Comomunications). Het programma is mede aangekondigd uit naam van een aantal partners, namelijk Maxis, de grootste mobiele provider van Maleisië, met meer dan 11 miljoen abonnees, Nokia, `s werelds grootste producent van mobiele telefoons, en Maybank, een toonaangevende financiële dienstverlener in Maleisië. De introductie van de dienst betekent dat consumenten voor het eerst in de winkel een mobiele telefoon met NFC-functie kunnen kopen waarmee ze in winkels kunnen betalen, zodat ze de traditionele betaalkaart niet meer nodig hebben. Visa brengt zijn expertise in betalingen mee naar de mobiele branche en werkt actief samen met exploitanten van draadloze netwerken, met financiële instellingen, met producenten van mobiele telefoons en met bedrijven die de platformen en de technologie leveren. Met zijn mobiele strategie wil Visa het bereik van zijn wereldwijde netwerk uitbreiden en zo mobiele financiële diensten binnen het bereik brengen van consumenten in opkomende en ontwikkelde economieën. Het bedrijf levert diensten voor mobiel betalingsverkeer en aanverwante diensten via samenwerkingsverbanden met providers en financiële instellingen op vijf continenten. Over Visa Inc.: Visa Inc. exploiteert `s werelds grootste elektronische betalingsnetwerk voor de detailhandel. Visa Inc. zorgt voor de verwerking van betalingsopdrachten en levert platformen voor het betalen van producten. Dit omvat consumentenbetalingen d.m.v. creditcards en pinpassen, prepaid betalingen en commerciële betalingen, aangeboden onder de merknamen Visa, Visa Electron, Interlink en PLUS. Visa heeft een ongeëvenaard hoog acceptatieniveau in de hele wereld en Visa/PLUS is één van de grootste mondiale netwerken van geldautomaten ter wereld, dat in meer dan 170 landen toegang biedt tot contant geld in de lokale munteenheid. Ga voor meer informatie naar www.corporate.visa.com. Deze bekendmaking is officieel geldend in de originele brontaal. Vertalingen zijn slechts als leeshulp bedoeld en moeten worden vergeleken met de tekst in de brontaal welke als enige juridische geldigheid beoogt. Visa Inc. Elvira Swanson, +1 415-932-2564 globalmedia@visa.com Copyright Business Wire 2009

entry.author: None
entry.headline: Edison Mission/Chevron Calif. Sunrise plant back
entry.body:
NEW YORK, June 23 (Reuters) - Sunrise Power Co's 545-megawatt Sunrise natural gas-fired power plant in California returned to service by Monday afternoon, the California Independent System Operator said in a report.

The unit shut by June 19 for planned and normal reasons.

Edison Mission, a subsidiary of power company Edison International (EIX.N) of Rosemead, California, and oil company Chevron Corp (CVX.N) of San Ramon, California, each own half of Sunrise Power.

It is run by Edison Mission.

The combined-cycle generating plant is located in Fellows in Kern County, about 35 miles southwest of Bakersfield, California, and 130 miles north of Los Angeles. There are two 150 MW gas turbines and one 245 MW steam turbine at the station.

One MW powers about 700 homes in California.

Edison International, of Rosemead, California, owns and operates about 14,000 MW of generating capacity, markets energy commodities in North America, and transmits and distributes electricity to about 4.9 million customers in central and Southern California. (Reporting by Scott DiSavino; Editing by John Picinich)

entry.author: Juan Lagorio
entry.headline: More credit card rules could hurt Visa, MasterCard
entry.body:
NEW YORK (Reuters) - Visa Inc (V.N) and MasterCard Inc (MA.N), the world's largest payment networks, could face lower revenue and pressure on their stock prices amid a push for increased U.S. regulation of credit cards.

Specifically, Congress is mulling regulations on interchange rates -- fees retailers and merchants have to pay to banks that issue credit cards.

Most immediately, that would affect the banks that collect those fees. But some investors and analysts are concerned the banks -- already battered by credit losses and toxic assets -- could try to share the haircut with Visa and MasterCard.

"Longer term, I think it is a real risk for the model, but this could impact their stocks right now," said Donald Fandetti, an analyst at Citigroup.

Visa and MasterCard said the companies would not be impacted by the legislation because they do not charge interchange fees.

But concern about the legislation has contributed to a 10 percent drop in Visa's shares in the last month and a 5 percent decline for MasterCard, and the shares could fall further, analysts and investors say.

"It's an overhang on these stocks, at least until we have some clarity," said Moshe Katri, an analyst at Cowen Co, who said the legislation could impact the profitability of 20 percent of MasterCard's revenues and 10 percent of Visa's revenues.

Before the financial crisis, Visa's shares traded at 25 times future earnings and MasterCard stock was at 20 times. Now Visa's shares are trading closer to 20 times 2010 earnings and MasterCard stock is around 15 times.

These price-to-earnings multiples -- still high compared with many financials -- could become the new norm.

"This is heightened regulatory risk and we think investors will reflect that in a lower multiple," Fandetti said.

Visa's shares ended down 0.21 percent at $61.24, while MasterCard stock fell 2.83 percent to $156.78.

SHARE THE PAIN

The interchange fees laws currently under discussion would be in addition to recent legislation already approved limiting credit card fees and interest rates.

The legislation would give merchants and retailers more power to negotiate interchange fees with banks. It follows longtime complaints from store owners that banks have colluded to set fee structures and block them from negotiating with Visa and MasterCard.

Last year, interchange fees rose 14 percent to about $48 billion, averaging about 1.75 percent of total purchases.

Visa and MasterCard are partially insulated from the impact of the legislation because they make the bulk of their money every time a person swipes a card and do not collect interchange fees, but they could be affected by a retrenchment in the credit card industry.

In addition, analysts estimate the companies receive around 10 cents per $100 transaction from the card issuers and, if banks were forced to cut interchange rates, the financial institutions could ask Visa and MasterCard to share the pain.

Analysts also said the world's biggest payment networks could be near a renegotiation of their contracts with some big U.S. banks, which could ask for lower prices.

"It is adding some pricing pressure," said Walter Todd, portfolio manager at Greenwood Capital Associates.

Visa and MasterCard have said merchants already are able to negotiate lower fees.

"We don't see Congress legislating interchange fees or setting prices," William Sheedy, president of Visa for North America, told Reuters in an interview.

"The real question is whether the government is going to jump in and get into the game of price control in the free market. At the end of the day, this is price control and this just doesn't smell right," said Chris McWilton, MasterCard's president of U.S. markets, at an investor's conference earlier this month.

Sheedy and MasterCard's spokeswoman Sharon Gamsin said the pending legislation would not affect their companies revenue. Both added that, when Australia cut interchange fees, neither Visa nor MasterCard were hurt by the action.

(Reporting by Juan Lagorio; editing by Andre Grenon)

entry.author: None
entry.headline: ExxonMobil amplía su capacidad de procesamiento de gas natural en la cuenca Piceance
entry.body: * Instalaciones preparadas para aumentar de manera constante el abastecimiento a los mercados estadounidenses * La tecnología de perforación y las mejores prácticas permiten obtener gas con mayor eficacia HOUSTON--(Business Wire)-- ExxonMobil Production Company anunció hoy la finalización de la nueva capacidad de procesamiento de campo de su Proyecto Piceance en la ladera oeste de las Montañas Rocallosas, en el condado de Río Blanco, Colorado. Las nuevas instalaciones tienen la capacidad de manejar hasta 200 millones de pies cúbicos por día de gas natural. Incluyen sistemas de recolección de gas y de líquido, plantas de tratamiento, una tubería de agua producida, un sistema subterráneo de eliminación de desechos y un sitio condensado para ventas y carga de camiones. ExxonMobil ha estado produciendo gas natural en la cuenca de Piceance por más de 50 años y actualmente produce alrededor de 100 millones de pies cúbicos por día. En la actualidad, la compañía opera siete plataformas de perforación para aumentar su producción en Piceance. "Un proyecto como el de Piceance representa una visión a largo plazo y un compromiso con el desarrollo energético", afirma Rich Kruger, presidente de ExxonMobil Production Company. "La clave para explotar todo el potencial de este recurso enorme y técnicamente exigente reside en aumentar los índices de producción y de recuperación de cada pozo a menor costo. Para lograrlo, los científicos e ingenieros de ExxonMobil están trabajando en la optimización de las tecnologías y los procesos facilitadores." Se prevé que el gas natural será la principal fuente de combustible, fundamentalmente porque se utiliza cada vez más para generar electricidad. Los arrendamientos de ExxonMobil en la cuenca de Piceance poseen un recurso recuperable potencial de 45 billones de pies cúbicos de gas. "ExxonMobil está comprometida a desarrollar este recurso de manera eficaz y con conciencia y respeto por el medio ambiente", sostiene Kruger. Éxito mediante la tecnología patentada de ExxonMobil El gas natural de la cuenca de Piceance se encuentra atrapado entre rocas densas como el concreto y en zonas discontinuas separadas por delgadas capas de esquisto. Para recuperar el "gas atrapado", ExxonMobil está aplicando tecnología patentada y las mejores prácticas. "Los pozos de Piceance excavados con nuestra tecnología patentada de fracturación producen mucho más que los pozos fracturados de manera convencional y a menor costo", señala Jim Branch, gerente del proyecto Piceance de ExxonMobil. "Implementamos el proceso patentado de perforación rápida (Fast Drill) de ExxonMobil y la tecnología de estimulación multizona con perforación justo a tiempo (Just-in-Time Perforation) para acceder a unas 50 zonas que contienen gas en un mismo pozo, algo que se desconocía hasta hace pocos años. Podemos excavar hasta 9 ó 10 pozos desde una sola plataforma, con reducción de la superficie afectada. Cada pozo puede recuperar gas ubicado en un área de 20 acres (8 hectáreas) bajo tierra. Con este proceso rentable se obtiene mucho más gas de las numerosas zonas que cada pozo puede explotar." Para el proyecto, la conservación del agua es una prioridad. ExxonMobil desarrolló un sistema que reutiliza para otros procesos el agua que se recupera de la producción. Así se reduce el consumo de agua dulce en un 80%. ExxonMobil realiza estudios exhaustivos de flora, fauna y arqueología para ayudar a manejar el desempeño ambiental de las operaciones en la cuenca de Piceance. Asimismo, junto con instituciones educativas locales y agencias gubernamentales, la compañía participa en estudios con el fin de maximizar la protección de los hábitats naturales y de la vegetación en el área de desarrollo del proyecto. Enterprise Products Partners L.P. construyó nuevas instalaciones de planta y tuberías en el proyecto Piceance para proporcionar servicios de compresión, tratamiento y acondicionamiento para el gas natural producido, que se envía a varios sistemas de tuberías de transmisión que abastecen a la región. ADVERTENCIA: Las estimaciones, las expectativas y los planes de negocios contenidos en este comunicado son declaraciones prospectivas. Los resultados futuros reales, entre ellos el aumento de la demanda, la recuperación de recursos, las tasas de producción, los planes y programas del proyecto, y el impacto de la nueva tecnología pueden diferir considerablemente debido a los cambios en las condiciones del mercado que afectan la industria del petróleo y el gas o a los niveles de precio del petróleo o el gas; desarrollos políticos o regulatorios; rendimiento de las reservas; término a tiempo de los proyectos de desarrollo; factores técnicos u operativos; y otros factores tratados en el apartado titulado "Factores que afectan los resultados futuros" (Factors Affecting Future Results) en la sección "Inversores" (Investors) de nuestro sitio web (www.exxonmobil.com) y en el ítem 1A de nuestro más reciente Formulario 10-K. Las referencias a "recursos recuperables" y términos similares incluyen cantidades de petróleo y gas que aún no han sido clasificadas como reservas probadas, pero que creemos que serán producidas en el futuro. Fotos y galería multimedia disponibles en: http://www.businesswire.com/cgi-bin/mmg.cgi?eid=5992138=en El texto original en el idioma fuente de este comunicado es la versión oficial autorizada. Las traducciones solo se suministran como adaptación y deben cotejarse con el texto en el idioma fuente, que es la única versión del texto que tendrá un efecto legal. entry.author: None
entry.headline: ExxonMobil erhöht Erdgas-Verarbeitungskapazitäten im Piceance-Becken
entry.body: * Anlagen zur kontinuierlichen Erhöhung der Lieferungen für den US-Markt eingerichtet * Bohrtechnik und bewährte Verfahren produzieren kostengünstiger mehr Gas HOUSTON--(Business Wire)-- Die ExxonMobil Production Company meldete heute die Fertigstellung einer neuen Verarbeitungsanlage für ihr Piceance-Projekt westlich der Rocky Mountains im Rio Blanco County, Colorado. Die neuen Anlagen können bis zu 200 Millionen Kubikfuß (5,66 Mio. m³) Erdgas pro Tag verarbeiten. Sie umfassen Gas- und Flüssigkeitssammelsysteme, Verarbeitungsanlagen, eine Pipeline und ein unterirdisches Entsorgungssystem für Formationswasser, eine Kondensatverkaufs- und eine Lkw-Beladestelle. ExxonMobil produziert im Piceance-Becken seit fast 50 Jahren Erdgas und erreicht derzeit Produktionsmengen von 100 Millionen Kubikfuß (2,83 Mio. m³) pro Tag. Das Unternehmen betreibt zurzeit sieben Bohrtürme zur Erhöhung der Produktion im Piceance-Becken. „Ein Projekt wie Piceance zeigt langfristiges Denken und Engagement in der Energieentwicklung", sagt Rich Kruger, Präsident der ExxonMobil Production Company. „Der Schlüssel, um das Potential dieser riesigen, technisch anspruchsvollen Ressourcen zu erschließen, ist die Erhöhung der Produktion und des Ertrags aller Bohrungen bei geringeren Kosten. Wissenschaftler und Ingenieure von ExxonMobil arbeiten hart daran, die technischen Voraussetzungen und Verfahren zu genau diesem Zweck zu verbessern." Erdgas soll Erwartungen zufolge die am schnellsten wachsende Treibstoffquelle werden, insbesondere infolge ihrer zunehmenden Nutzung zur Stromerzeugung. Die Pachtflächen von ExxonMobil im Piceance-Becken enthalten potenziell förderbare Ressourcen von 45 Billionen Kubikfuß (1,27 Billionen m³) Erdgas. „ExxonMobil setzt sich dafür ein, diese Ressource auf effiziente und umweltbewusste Art zu erschließen", so Kruger. Erfolg durch geschützte Technologien von ExxonMobil Im Piceance-Becken ist das Erdgas in Felsgestein mit einer Dichte wie Beton eingeschlossen, in mehreren Zonen, die durch dünne Schichten Schiefer voneinander getrennt sind. Um das „Tight Gas" zu fördern, verwendet ExxonMobil geschützte Technologien und bewährte Verfahren. „Die Piceance-Bohrungen, die mit unserer geschützten Bruchtechnologie gemacht wurden, produzieren deutlich mehr als auf herkömmliche Art hergestellte Bohrungen, und mit geringeren Kosten", erklärt der Leiter des Piceance-Projekts von ExxonMobil, Jim Branch. „Wir nutzen das geschützte „Fast Drill"-Verfahren und die „Multi-zone Stimulation"-Technologie von ExxonMobil mit Just-in-Time-Perforation, um bis zu 50 Gaslagerzonen mit einer Bohrung zu erreichen, was vor ein paar Jahren noch undenkbar war. Wir können von einer einzigen Plattform aus bis zu neun oder zehn Bohrungen durchführen, mit deutlich weniger Oberflächenstörungen. Jede Bohrung erreicht so Gaslager, die sich über 20 Acre (8 Hektar) unter der Erde erstrecken. Das kostengünstige Verfahren erzielt deutlich höhere Gaserträge aus den vielen Zonen, die es von einer einzigen Bohrung aus anzapfen kann." Wasserschutz ist bei diesem Projekt sehr wichtig. ExxonMobil hat ein System entwickelt, bei dem das bei der Produktion anfallende Wasser für andere Prozesse wiederverwendet wird. Dadurch sinkt der Süßwasserverbrauch um etwa 80 %. ExxonMobil führt umfassende Untersuchungen der Tier- und Pflanzenwelt und archäologische Untersuchungen durch, um die Umwelteinflüsse der Aktivitäten im Piceance-Becken zu kontrollieren. Außerdem nimmt das Unternehmen an Studien von lokalen Bildungseinrichtungen und Regierungsbehörden teil, um die natürlichen Lebensräume und Pflanzenarten im Projektgebiet bestmöglich zu schützen. Enterprise Products Partners L.P. hat für das Piceance-Projekt neue Anlagen und Pipelines zur Komprimierung, Behandlung und Konditionierung des produzierten Erdgases gebaut, das anschließend in verschiedene Versorgungssysteme der Region eingeleitet wird. WARNHINWEIS: In dieser Presseinformation enthaltene Schätzungen, Erwartungen und Geschäftspläne stellen vorausblickende Aussagen dar. Tatsächliche zukünftige Ergebnisse, einschließlich Bedarfsentwicklung, Ressourcenerschließung, Produktionsmengen, Projektplänen und Zeitplänen sowie die Auswirkungen neuer Technologien können deutlich davon abweichen, zum Beispiel aufgrund von Änderungen der Marktbedingungen mit Auswirkungen auf die Öl- und Gasindustrie oder langfristige Öl- und Gas-Preisniveaus; durch politische oder gesetzliche Entwicklungen; Reservoirleistung; den rechtzeitigen Abschluss von Erschließungsprojekten; technische und betriebliche Faktoren; und andere Faktoren, die unter der Überschrift „Factors Affecting Future Results" (zukünftige Ergebnisse beeinflussende Faktoren) im Bereich Investor Information unserer Webseite (www.exxonmobil.com) und unter Item 1A unseres aktuellsten Formblattes 10-K (amerikanischer Geschäftsbericht) dargestellt werden. Bezugnahmen auf „förderbare Ressourcen" und ähnliche Begriffe schließen auch Öl- und Gasvorkommen ein, die noch nicht als belegte Vorkommen klassifiziert sind, von denen wir jedoch glauben, dass sie in Zukunft erschlossen werden. entry.headline: ExxonMobil étend sa capacité de traitement de gaz naturel dans le bassin de Piceance
entry.body: * Les installations en place vont permettre d`augmenter progressivement l`approvisionnement des marchés américains * Une production plus rentable d`une plus grande quantité de gaz grâce à la technologie de forage et aux pratiques d`excellence HOUSTON--(Business Wire)-- ExxonMobil Production Company a annoncé aujourd`hui l`achèvement d`une nouvelle capacité de traitement de champ dans le cadre de son Projet de Piceance situé sur le versant ouest des montagnes Rocheuses dans le comté de Rio Blanco au Colorado. La capacité des nouvelles installations permet de traiter jusqu`à 5,66 millions de m3 de gaz naturel par jour. Elles comportent des réseaux collecteurs de gaz et de liquides, des installations de traitement, un pipeline d`eau produite et un système souterrain d`évacuation, ainsi qu`un site de vente de condensats et de chargement de camions. ExxonMobil produit du gaz naturel dans le bassin de Piceance depuis près de 50 ans et en produit à l`heure actuelle environ 2,83 millions de m3 par jour. La société exploite actuellement sept installations de forage afin d`augmenter sa production au niveau de Piceance. « Un projet tel que celui de Piceance représente une vision à long terme du développement énergétique et un engagement envers ce développement », déclare Rich Kruger, président d`ExxonMobil Production Company. « La clé si l`on veut débloquer le potentiel de cette ressource abondante, mais difficile d`un point de vue technique est d`accroître les taux de production et de récupération de chaque puits à un coût plus faible. Les scientifiques et ingénieurs ExxonMobil font tout leur possible pour améliorer les technologies catalysantes et les processus exactement dans ce but. » On estime que le gaz naturel sera l`importante source de carburant à croître le plus rapidement, poussée en grande partie par le fait de sa plus grande utilisation pour générer de l`électricité. Les concessions d`ExxonMobil dans le bassin de Piceance jouissent d`un potentiel de ressources récupérables de 1,27 billion de m3 de gaz. « ExxonMobil s`est donnée pour mission de développer cette ressource de manière rentable en tenant compte de l`environnement », indique M. Kruger. La réussite grâce à la technologie exclusive ExxonMobil Le gaz naturel dans le bassin de Piceance est pris dans une roche aussi dure que du béton et se trouve dans des zones dispersées séparées par de fines couches de schiste. Pour récupérer le « gaz avare », ExxonMobil met en application une technologie exclusive et des pratiques d`excellence. « Les puits de Piceance qui ont été complétés en utilisant notre technologie de fracturation exclusive produisent considérablement plus que les puits qui ont été fracturés de façon conventionnelle et à un coût moindre », confie quant à lui Jim Branch, cadre exécutif du Projet de Piceance d`ExxonMobil. « Nous utilisons la technologie exclusive d`ExxonMobil de processus de forage rapide (Fast Drill) et de stimulation multi-zones (Multi-zone Stimulation) avec une perforation Just-in-Time pour accéder à un maximum de 50 zones gazéifères dans un puits, du jamais vu il n`y a encore que quelques années. Nous pouvons forer jusqu`à 9 ou 10 puits à partir d`une seule plateforme, en dérangeant moins la surface. Chaque puits peut récupérer du gaz situé sur environ 8 hectares sous la surface. Le processus rentable produit considérablement plus de gaz des nombreuses zones dans lesquelles il est possible de puiser au niveau de chaque puits. » La conservation de l`eau est une priorité dans ce projet. ExxonMobil a élaboré un système qui réutilise l`eau récupérée de la production pour d`autres processus. Ceci réduit la consommation en eau douce d`environ 80 %. ExxonMobil conduit des études poussées sur la faune et la flore, ainsi qu`archéologiques afin de mieux gérer la performance environnementale des opérations du bassin de Piceance. La société participe également à des études en collaboration avec des agences gouvernementales et des établissements d`enseignement locaux afin de maximiser la protection des habitats de la faune et des espèces de plantes indigènes dans la zone de développement du projet. Enterprise Products Partners L.P. a construit des installations telles que des usine et gazoduc pour le projet de Piceance pour fournir des services de compression, traitement et conditionnement pour le gaz naturel produit, qui est livré dans divers systèmes de transmission par gazoduc desservant la région. MISE EN GARDE : les estimations, attentes et business plans évoqués dans le présent communiqué sont des déclarations prévisionnelles. Les résultats futurs réels, notamment la croissance de la demande, les récupérations de ressources, les taux de production, les plans et calendriers de projets et l`impact d`une nouvelle technologie, pourront être substantiellement différents en raison de l`évolution de la conjoncture des marchés ayant un impact sur le secteur pétrolier et gazier ou sur les prix du pétrole et du gaz à long terme ; des développements au niveau politique ou des réglementations ; de la performance des réservoirs ; de l`achèvement en temps voulu des projets de développement ; de facteurs techniques ou d`exploitation ; et d`autres facteurs abordés à la rubrique « Facteurs affectant les résultats futurs » (Factors Affecting Future Results) dans la section des informations destinées aux investisseurs de notre site Web (www.exxonmobil.com) et à l`article 1A de notre formulaire 10-K le plus récent. Les références faites à des « ressources récupérables » et à des termes semblables incluent des quantités de pétrole et de gaz qui n`ont pas encore été classées comme réserves prouvées, mais qui selon nous devraient, à terme, être produites. Photos/Galerie multimédia disponibles sur : http://www.businesswire.com/cgi-bin/mmg.cgi?eid=5992138=en Le texte du communiqué issu d`une traduction ne doit d`aucune manière être considéré comme officiel. La seule version du communiqué qui fasse foi est celle du communiqué dans sa langue d`origine. La traduction devra toujours être confrontée au texte source, qui fera jurisprudence. ExxonMobil Margaret Ross, +1 713 656 4376 Copyright Business Wire 2009

entry.author: None
entry.headline: Zimbabwe says mines minister denied British visa
entry.body: (Adds comments from conference, Zimbabwe high commission) HARARE, June 23 (Reuters) - Britain has denied Zimbabwe's mines minister a visa for an investment conference, fuelling anger in President Robert Mugabe's ZANU-PF party over continued Western sanctions on its officials. Mugabe formed a unity government in February with arch-rival Morgan Tsvangirai, now prime minister, to try to end an economic and political crisis worsened last year by a disputed presidential poll. Tsvangirai is in London as part of a Western tour to drum up financial support for Zimbabwe's new government. But on Tuesday, a Harare government official said Britain had refused Mines and Mining Development Minister Obert Mpofu a visa -- under European Union travel sanctions against Mugabe and his top associates. The minister had wanted to travel to London to address a conference on investment opportunities in the southern African country. The minister did not get a visa and in our view all this does not make sense except to confirm that some people in London are pursuing their fight against ZANU-PF, the official said. They are trying to undermine the inclusive government with this sort of attitude. A representative of the Zimbabwean High Commission in London said he had been excluded because he was on the British government's banned list as a member of Mugabe's circle. Denis Worrall, chairman of Omega Investment Mining Partners and one of the conference organisers, said Mpofu was absent because he had been denied a visa. Other delegates criticised the decision, comparing it unfavourably with Britain's improved relations with Libya. Colonel (Muammar) Gaddafi has been rehabilitated. If he can be rehabilitated, who can't? Zimbabwe does not have a Lockerbie on its books, said Andrew Cranswick, CEO of African Consolidated Resources, a mining company with investments in Zimbabwe. Africa minister Mark Malloch-Brown said last week it was too early to lift sanctions on Zimbabwe but said there was room for flexibility in allowing ZANU-PF ministers to travel to Britain. There was no immediate statement from the British embassy in Harare, which traditionally does not comment on visa issues, nor from the British government in London. Britain pledged 5 million pounds ($8 million) to Zimbabwe on Monday but made clear more reforms were needed before it would start large-scale development aid to the shattered country. British Prime Minister Gordon Brown told Tsvangirai there were great signs of progress, but the power-sharing government still had to meet a number of tests on the road to democracy. (Reporting by Cris Chinaka in Harare and Luke Baker in London) FILED UNDER:

entry.author: None
entry.headline: Visa lanciert ersten kommerziellen mobilen Zahlungsdienst in Lateinamerika
entry.body: Zusammenarbeit mit Telefónica und VisaNet Perú unterstreicht wachsende Nachfrage nach elektronischem Zahlungsverkehr und anderen Diensten in Lateinamerika SAN FRANCISCO & BARCELONA (Kalifornien), USA--(Business Wire)-- Visa Inc. (NYSE: V), das weltweit führende Unternehmen für Zahlungsdienste, hat die Einführung eines mobilen Zahlungsprogramms in Zusammenarbeit mit VisaNet Perú und Telefónica angekündigt. Pago Móvil con Visa (mobil bezahlen mit Visa) ist eine neue Dienstleistung, mit welcher Inhaber einer Visa-Karte Güter und Dienstleistungen bezahlen können, indem sie die Bezahlung einfach über das Mobilfunknetz auslösen. Die Dienstleistung steht Inhabern einer Visa-Karte (Kredit- oder Debitkarte) offen, die von der Banco de Crédito, der Interbank, der BBVA Continental oder der Scotiabank in Peru ausgestellt wurde. Das erste kommerzielle mobile Zahlungsprogramm von Visa in Peru, das heute vom zweiten jährlichen GSMA Mobile Money Summit im kalifornischen Barcelona aus angekündigt wurde, ist das erste derartige Programm in Lateinamerika. Inhaber einer Visa-Karte können über ihr Mobiltelefon zunächst einmal den Fahrpreis im Taxi bezahlen und Blumen verschicken, aber auch ihr Prepaid-Guthaben aufladen. Weitere Handelssegmente sind vorgesehen, so etwa die Lieferung von Arzneimitteln, die Gasverteilung und Katalogbestellungen. „Wir erreichen einen Meilenstein in der Zahlungsindustrie in Lateinamerika", sagte Jürgen Wassmann, Leiter der Abteilung für entstehende Produkte und Kanäle für Visa Inc. in Lateinamerika und der Karibik. „Visa bringt die Zahlungsmethode der Zukunft nach Lateinamerika zusammen mit einem Verfahren, das den Verbrauchern das Leben leichter macht, indem sie überall und zu jeder Zeit auf einfache und bequeme Weise bezahlen können." Pago Móvil con Visa ist besonders attraktiv für Händler in abgelegenen Gebieten und mobile Geschäfte ohne Zugang zu fest installierter Telekommunikationsinfrastruktur. Der Dienst erlaubt Händlern die Annahme elektronischer Zahlungen über das Mobilfunknetz, ohne dass sie ein herkömmliches (fest installiertes) Zahlungsterminal benötigen. Das Unternehmen VisaNet Perú, das Zahlungstransaktionen mit Kredit- und Debitkarten von Visa in Peru abrechnet, betreut die Einführung von Pago Móvil con Visa. Vom Versuch zur Kommerzialisierung „Die Verbrauchernachfrage nach sicherem und gut funktionierendem Zugang zu mobilen Finanzdienstleistungen verzeichnet einen weltweiten Anstieg", sagte Tim Attinger, Globaler Leiter der Abteilung für Produktentwicklung bei Visa Inc., anlässlich seiner Grundsatzrede am Mobile Money Summit in Barcelona, Kalifornien. „Wir erreichen einen Wendepunkt, an dem unsere anfänglichen Bemühungen im Zusammenhang mit mobilen Zahlungstechnologien rund um den Globus im Bereich Mobile Commerce von der Versuchsphase in den kommerziellen Einsatz übergehen." Die Einführung von Pago Móvil con Visa folgt wenige Wochen nach der Einführung des weltweit ersten kommerziellen mobilen Zahlungsdienstes von Visa mit NFC-Technologie (Near Field Communications). Angekündigt wurde dieses Programm zusammen mit Maxis, dem mit über 11 Millionen Abonnenten größten Mobilfunkanbieter in Malaysia, dem weltweit führenden Mobiltelefonhersteller Nokia und Maybank, einem führenden malaysischen Finanzinstitut. Mit der Einführung des Dienstes konnten Verbraucher in einem Mobilfunkgeschäft zum ersten Mal ein NFC-Mobilgerät kaufen, mit dem sie am Verkaufsort bezahlen können, ohne eine herkömmliche Zahlungskarte einsetzen zu müssen. Visa bringt sein Fachwissen im Zahlungsverkehr in die Mobilfunkindustrie ein und arbeitet aktiv mit Mobilfunkbetreibern, Finanzinstituten, Mobiltelefonherstellern sowie Plattform- und Technologieanbietern zusammen. Die mobile Strategie von Visa besteht darin, die Reichweite des globalen Netzwerks des Unternehmens dahingehend auszudehnen, dass Verbraucher sowohl in Industrie- als auch in Schwellenländern Zugang zu mobilen Finanzdienstleistungen erhalten. Das Unternehmen bietet durch Partnerschaften mit Telefongesellschaften und Finanzinstituten bereits mobile Zahlungsdienste und ähnliche Dienstleistungen auf fünf Kontinenten. Über Visa Inc.: Visa Inc. betreibt das weltweit größte Netzwerk für elektronische Zahlungen aus dem Einzelhandel und bietet dabei Verarbeitungsdienstleistungen und Zahlungsproduktplattformen. Dazu zählen Kredit-, Debit- und Vorauszahlungen für Verbraucher sowie gewerbliche Zahlungen, die über die Marken Visa, Visa Electron, Interlink und PLUS angeboten werden. Visa genießt rund um die Welt einen hervorragenden Ruf, und Visa/PLUS verfügt über eines der größten Geldautomatennetzwerke der Welt, durch das in über 170 Ländern Geldbeträge in der Landeswährung abgehoben werden können. Weitere Informationen finden Sie unter www.corporate.visa.com. Die Ausgangssprache, in der der Originaltext veröffentlicht wird, ist die offizielle und autorisierte Version. entry.author: None
entry.headline: Visa lance le premier service de paiement mobile commercial en Amérique latine
entry.body: Son partenariat avec Telefónica et VisaNet Perú souligne la demande croissante qui existe pour des services et des paiements électroniques en Amérique latine SAN FRANCISCO & BARCELONE, Californie--(Business Wire)-- Visa Inc. (NYSE : V), leader mondial des paiements, a annoncé le lancement d`un programme de paiement mobile en collaboration avec VisaNet Perú et Telefónica. Pago Móvil con Visa (Visa Mobile Pay) est un nouveau service qui permet aux titulaires de carte Visa du Pérou de régler des produits et des services en effectuant un paiement sur le réseau sans fil. Ce service est offert aux titulaires de compte Visa possédant des cartes de crédit ou de débit émises par Banco de Crédito, Interbank, BBVA Continental et Scotiabank au Pérou. Le premier programme de paiement mobile commercial de Visa au Pérou, annoncé aujourd'hui lors du deuxième forum GSMA Mobile Money Summit annuel à Barcelone, est le premier programme en son genre en Amérique latine. Initialement, les titulaires de compte Visa pourront utiliser leur téléphone portable pour payer un taxi ou envoyer une composition florale, et pour recharger leur compte prépayé sans fil. L`ajout d`autres segments de commerce est envisagé, notamment la livraison de produits pharmaceutiques, la distribution d`essence et les commandes par catalogue. « Nous atteignons une étape jalon dans le secteur des paiements en Amérique latine », a déclaré Jurgen Wassmann, directeur des produits et canaux émergents de Visa Inc., Amérique latine et Caraïbes. « Visa apporte les paiements du futur à l`Amérique latine avec une technologie qui facilite la vie des consommateurs en leur permettant d`effectuer des paiements n'importe quand, n'importe où, et de façon à la fois simple et pratique ». Pago Móvil con Visa est particulièrement intéressant pour les commerçants des régions isolées et les entreprises mobiles ne disposant pas d`un accès à une infrastructure de télécommunications câblée. Ce service permet aux commerçants d`accepter des paiements électroniques via le réseau sans fil, éliminant la nécessité de disposer d`un terminal de paiement traditionnel (câblé). VisaNet Perú, l`acquéreur des transactions de paiement par carte de crédit et de débit Visa au Pérou, encadre le déploiement de Pago Móvil con Visa. Des essais à la commercialisation « La demande du consommateur pour un accès efficace et sécurisé à des services financiers mobiles ne cesse d`augmenter à l'échelle mondiale », a déclaré Tim Attinger, directeur mondial du développement de produits de Visa Inc., dans son discours liminaire au forum Mobile Money Summit de Barcelone. « Nous atteignons un point déterminant en ce sens que nos efforts antérieurs en matière de tests de la technologie de paiements mobiles dans le monde ont commencé à faire passer le commerce mobile du stade de test au stade de déploiement commercial intégral ». Le lancement de Pago Móvil con Visa survient seulement quelques semaines après celui du premier service de paiement mobile commercial Visa au monde pour les transactions de point de vente utilisant la technologie des communications en champ proche (NFC). Le programme a été annoncé conjointement avec Maxis, le plus grand opérateur sans fil de Malaisie, qui revendique plus de 11 millions d`abonnés ; Nokia, le plus grand fabricant de combinés au monde ; et Maybank, une institution financière de premier plan de Malaisie. Grâce au lancement de ce service, c`est la première fois que les consommateurs peuvent acheter un appareil mobile validé NFC dans un magasin d`appareils sans fil, et utiliser cet appareil pour effectuer des paiements au point de vente au lieu d`utiliser une carte de paiement traditionnelle. Visa apporte son expertise en paiements au secteur sans fil et collabore activement avec des exploitants de réseau sans fil, des institutions financières, des fabricants de combinés, et des prestataires de plates-formes et de technologie. La stratégie mobile de Visa consiste à étendre la portée de son réseau mondial pour offrir des services financiers mobiles aux consommateurs dans les économies tant émergentes que développées. La société propose déjà des paiements mobiles et des services connexes par le biais d`opérateurs et d`institutions financières partenaires sur cinq continents. À propos de Visa Inc. : Visa Inc. exploite le plus vaste réseau de paiements électroniques au détail du monde, fournissant des services de traitement et des plateformes de produits de paiement. Ceci inclut les paiements par carte de crédit et de débit à la consommation, par carte prépayée ou par carte commerciale, offerts sous les marques Visa, Visa Electron, Interlink et PLUS brands. La carte Visa est la plus acceptée dans le monde, et Visa/PLUS est l`un des réseaux mondiaux de guichets automatiques bancaires les plus importants, offrant un accès à la monnaie locale dans plus de 170 pays. Pour de plus amples informations, consulter www.corporate.visa.com. Le texte du communiqué issu d`une traduction ne doit d`aucune manière être considéré comme officiel. La seule version du communiqué qui fasse foi est celle du communiqué dans sa langue d`origine. La traduction devra toujours être confrontée au texte source, qui fera jurisprudence. Visa Inc. Elvira Swanson, +1 415 932 2564 globalmedia@visa.com Copyright Business Wire 2009

entry.author: None
entry.headline: Zimbabwe says mines minister denied British visa
entry.body: HARARE, June 23 (Reuters) - Britain has denied Zimbabwe's mines minister a visa for an investment conference, fuelling anger in President Robert Mugabe's ZANU-PF party over continued Western sanctions on its officials. Mugabe formed a unity government in February with arch-rival Morgan Tsvangirai, now prime minister, to try to end an economic and political crisis worsened last year by a disputed presidential poll. Tsvangirai is in London as part of a Western tour to drum up financial support for Zimbabwe's new government. But on Tuesday, a Harare government official said Britain had refused mines and mining development minister Obert Mpofu a visa -- under European Union travel sanctions against Mugabe and his top associates. The minister had wanted to travel to London to address a conference this week on investment opportunities in the southern African country. The minister did not get a visa and in our view all this does not make sense except to confirm that some people in London are pursuing their fight against ZANU-PF, the official said. They are trying to undermine the inclusive government with this sort of attitude. The official declined to be named or to say how ZANU-PF would respond. There was no immediate statement from the British embassy in Harare, which traditionally does not comment on visa issues, nor from the British government in London. Britain pledged 5 million pounds ($8 million) to Zimbabwe on Monday but made clear more reforms were needed before it would start large-scale development aid to the shattered country. British Prime Minister Gordon Brown told Tsvangirai there were great signs of progress, but the power-sharing government still had to meet a number of tests on the road to democracy. (Reporting by Cris Chinaka) FILED UNDER:

entry.author: None
entry.headline: Procter & Gamble Wins 2009 Supply Chain Distinction Award for Implementation of Terra Technology`s Demand Sensing
entry.body: Intelligent Daily Forecasting project decreases inventory while improving customer service levels NORWALK, Conn.--(Business Wire)-- The Procter & Gamble Company (NYSE: PG) has won the Supply Chain Distinction Award in the `Operational Excellence` category for their global implementation of Terra Technology`s Demand Sensing (DS). The Intelligent Daily Forecasting (IDF) project has enabled P to increase forecast accuracy, decrease inventory and improve supply chain performance. The award was presented on 9 June at the 11th Annual European Supply Chain & Logistics Summit in Düsseldorf, Germany. "In the current economic climate -- with ever increasing volatility in demand -- it is crucial to extend the supply chain visibility as close to our customers as possible," explains Nils Mueller, Global IDF Initiative Manager for Procter & Gamble. "Speed today is of the essence. Only those companies that can respond quickly to customer and consumer needs will stay ahead. Terra`s software provides P the ability to stay ahead of shifts in consumer demand." Procter & Gamble implemented Terra Technology`s DS to improve short-term forecast accuracy, enabling P to reduce inventory and facilitate supply and demand collaboration. DS analyzes daily streams of demand data, using pattern recognition mathematics to determine what available demand information is relevant and creating a more accurate forecast. The enterprise-wide roll-out has reduced forecast error by up to 45 percent for P In the next phase of the project, P is focusing on integrating additional customer demand signals into the planning process by implementing Terra`s Multi-Enterprise Demand Sensing, which is expected to further improve forecast accuracy in order to achieve superior customer service. Robert F. Byrne, President and CEO of Terra Technology, said, "Procter & Gamble continues to be recognized as a global supply chain leader, securing a spot as one of the top five supply chains in the world by AMR Research for five consecutive years. P maintains its supply chain advantage by investing in innovative technologies to improve efficiency and decrease costs." About Procter & Gamble Three billion times a day, P brands touch the lives of people around the world. The company has one of the strongest portfolios of trusted, quality, leadership brands, including Pampers, Tide, Ariel, Always, Whisper, Pantene, Mach3, Bounty, Dawn, Gain, Pringles, Charmin, Downy, Lenor, Iams, Crest, Oral-B, Actonel, Duracell, Olay, Head & Shoulders, Wella, Gillette, Braun and Fusion. The P community includes approximately 138,000 employees working in over 80 countries worldwide. Please visit http://www.pg.com for the latest news and in-depth information about P and its brands. About Terra Technology Terra Technology is the leading provider of demand sensing and inventory optimization software for consumer goods companies. Terra`s solutions incorporate demand signals from throughout the supply chain including retailer data, reducing forecast error by up to 50 percent and inventory by up to 20 percent. More accurate forecasts and inventory targets improve customer service, lower inventory, decrease unplanned changeovers and reduce costs. Terra`s customers include Campbell Soup, Kraft Foods, Procter & Gamble, Unilever and Ventura Foods. For more information, please visit www.terratechnology.com or call +1 203 847 4007. Media: Effective Communications Paul van de Braak, +31 (0)299 656404 effective-communications@planet.nl or DPR Group, Inc. Michelle Perkins, +1 919 678 9200 mperkins@dprgroup.com or Terra Technology Mary Fields, +1 203 847 4007 x127 mary.fields@terratechnology.com Copyright Business Wire 2009
